name: The Weeknd Pac Clone parody
description:
It's the Big Game and it's half time. However, during the show, the Weeknd is stuck in a yellow maze and chased by background dancers! 

Directions: Collect the magic Pepsi ™  cans to fight back. Sponsors save lives. Can you defeat the maze in time? Or become a meme as you are caught and humiliated by CBS. Based off the popular meme.

Controls: use the arrow keys to control the Weeknd.
